Aversion to Fire.name: Aversion to Fire
Aversion to Fire.description: If the [[lookup @name]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Beast Whisperer.name: Beast Whisperer
Beast Whisperer.description: The [[lookup @name]] can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a common language.

Death Jinx.name: Death Jinx
Death Jinx.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, one random creature within 10 feet of the dead [[lookup @name]] is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBane000000]{Bane} spell (save DC 13), which lasts for its full duration.

Dimensional Disruption.name: Dimensional Disruption
Dimensional Disruption.description: Disruptive energy extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 30-foot Emanation. Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space in that area. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

Disciple of the Nine Hells.name: Disciple of the Nine Hells
Disciple of the Nine Hells.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.dmgmobImp0000000]{Imp} in the same space.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body and nonmagical possessions turn to dust. Any magic items it possessed are left behind in its space.

Emissary of Juiblex.name: Emissary of Juiblex
Emissary of Juiblex.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, its body disgorges a Hostile Ochre Jelly in the same space.

Fey Ancestry.name: Fey Ancestry
Fey Ancestry.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[charmed] condition, and magic can't put it to sleep.

Forbiddance.name: Forbiddance
Forbiddance.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of its occupants.

Gloom Shroud.name: Gloom Shroud
Gloom Shroud.description: Imperceptible energy channeled from the Shadowfell extends from the [[lookup @name]] in a 20-foot Emanation. Other creatures in that area have Disadvantage on Charisma checks and Charisma saving throws.

Light.name: Light
Light.description: The [[lookup @name]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this light or cause it to return. The light winks out if the [[lookup @name]] dies.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The [[lookup @name]] can mimic Beast sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Poison Tolerant.name: Poison Tolerant
Poison Tolerant.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

Resonant Connection.name: Resonant Connection
Resonant Connection.description: The [[lookup @name]] has a supernatural connection to another creature or an object and knows the most direct route to it, provided the two are within 1 mile of each other.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: The [[lookup @name]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Slaad Host.name: Slaad Host
Slaad Host.description: When the [[lookup @name]] dies, a Hostile Slaad Tadpole bursts from its innards in the same space.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition while it can see an ally within 30 feet of itself.

Telepathic Bond.name: Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description: The [[lookup @name]] is linked psychically to another creature. While both are on the same plane of existence, they can communicate telepathically with each other.

Telepathic Shroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
Telepathic Shroud.description: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to spells from the school of Divination. As a Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name]] can suppress this trait or reactivate it.

Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
Ventriloquism.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name]] speaks, it can choose a point within 30 feet of itself; its voice emanates from that point.

Warrior's Wrath.name: Warrior's Wrath
Warrior's Wrath.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on melee attack rolls against any &Reference[Bloodied] creature.

Wild Talent.name: Wild Talent
Wild Talent.description: Choose one cantrip; the [[lookup @name]] can cast that cantrip without spell components, using Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
